comments.author: quenoz.3859
comments.body:
Swish.2463:

To clarify, is it possible to pull a user’s ping to a server and map in a match in solo or team que and match them off client with other users that share the matches digital signature?

not possible

comments.author: Swish.2463
comments.body:
For the life of me I cannot think of a better title but I do figure this is the best place to.ask as many of you would know better..

Also please excuse any weird words or grammar my phone loves to correct me…

Here’s my question.

Would it be possible to.set up an off client site or voip type of thing for match making in spvp?

To clarify, is it possible to pull a user’s ping to a server and map in a match in solo or team que and match them off client with other users that share the matches digital signature?

This obviously doesn’t need to or shouldn’t be used on hotjoin matches.

If it’s possible I would wager it would be a more appealing alternative to those afraid of team speak or the like as it could potentially allow for much less of a set up on the users part.

Ideally, I just imagine a web page or.widget that must be signed into. However I also think something along these lines.May be considered as far too intrusive to the players privacy and without some. Decent security measures exploitable for does attacks or other less than savoury actions…

So any thoughts on this?
